data.name: Eject Button
data.summary: Held: When the holder takes damage from a move, it switches out for a party Pokémon of the Trainer's choice.
data.description:
Held
:   When the holder takes damage directly from a move and does not faint, it switches out for another non-fainted Pokémon in its party, as chosen by the Trainer.
This effect does not activate if another effect prevents the holder from switching out.
